data.text:
Varun Dhawan was born 24-04-1987 in Mumbai, India. He is an Indian Film Actor & son of well-known film director David Dhawan. He is known for his work in Bollywood cinema.He is the son of Bollywood Director David Dhawan, Nephew of Bollywood actor Anil Dhawan, Brother of Bollywood director Rohit Dhawan, Cousin of Bollywood actor Siddharth Dhawan, Second cousin to director Punit Malhotra and Nephew of Bollywood actress Rashmi Dhawan.

After assisting Karan Johar in My Name is Khan, Dhawan made his acting debut in 2012 with the film Student of The Year, alongside Sidharth Malhotra and Alia Bhatt. The movie was a huge hit and his role of a Rohan Nanda as a teen-aged son of Superrich was well received and was praised by critics. His next release was Main Tera Hero in 2014, was also a commercial success. The very same year he appeared in Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania. This film was a huge success and Dhawan’s performance was well appreciated by both critics and audiences. In 2015, he starred in crime thriller Badlapur. His performance in the film was heavily praised by7 almost all the film pundits and some of them even went on to say that he is a star in making. His next film was ABCD 2, opposite Shraddha Kapoor. Though the film received a mixed bag of reviews but was declared a commercial success at the box-office. He then went on to star in Rohit Shetty’s Dilwale. The film was a moderate success at the box-office. His latest release was his brother’s action film Dishoom alongside John Abraham and Jacqueline Fernandez. He gave back2back hits in Badrinath Nath Ki Dulhania and Judwaa2. His performance in both films was highly praised. He was recently seen in multistarrer film Kalank. Even with a star studded star-cast this movie boomed at the box-office. He will be next seen in high budget films like Bharat and Street Dancer. In addition to acting, he is also the most bankable star and is therefore seen in numerous commercials. He has also hosted and performed at various award shows as well.He was born to film director David Dhawan and Karuna Dhawan. He has a brother named Rohit Dhawan (Writer). Actor Anil Dhawan is his uncle. He was in a relationship with fashion designer Natasha Dalal and married with her on 24-01-2021.He was a very bright student during his school days.He knows his girlfriend Natasha Dalal since his school days.While he was studying in schools, he worked as a leaflet distributor.Prior to making his Bollywood debut, he worked as an assistant director to Karan Johar in his film My Name is Khan.He shares his birthday with legendary cricketer Sachin Tendulkar. Due to heredity of Obesity and Diabetes in his family, he avoids alcohol and sugar.34 years, 9months, 14 days old age Varun Dhawan will turn 35 on 24 April, 2022. Only 2 months, 16 days, 8 hours,29 minutes has left for his next birthdayVarun Dhawan has celebrated the total number of 35 birthdays till date. See the analysis by days count and bar grapVarun Dhawan was born on 24 April, 1987. Varun Dhawan is an Indian performing actor. In 2014, Varun Dhawan was considered one of the nation’s most generously compensated celebrity. Varun Dhawan has been starred in Forbes India celebrity 100 listing. Varun Dhawan performed in many movies that turned out to be monetarily fruitful, building up Varun Dhawan in the Hindi film industry. Varun Dhawan father was a movie chief director David Dhawan. Varun Dhawan, attended the H.R. College of Commerce and Economics. Varun Dhawan contemplated business management studies from the Nottingham Trent University. On the completion of studies Varun, filled in as an Assistant Director position along with Karan Johar in the Show ‘My Name Is Khan’ in 2010. In 2012, Varun Dhawan made his acting introduction debut with youngster movie Student of the Year, along with Sidharth Malhotra and Alia Bhatt, and directed by Karan Johar. This movie granted Varun Dhawan a Filmfare nomination for Best Male Debut.
